meanings.definition: One of a series of curved bones that are articulated with the vertebrae and occur in pairs, 12 in humans, on each side of the vertebrate body, certain pairs being connected with the sternum and forming the thoracic wall.
meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her ribs after falling.
meanings.sent2: The chef grilled the ribs to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The ribs in the barbecue were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: His laughter shook his ribs with joy.
meanings.sent5: The ribs protected his vital organs like a sturdy shield.

meanings.definition: A cut of meat containing or consisting of the ribs.
meanings.sent1: The ribs at the restaurant were tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: He ordered a full rack of ribs for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The ribs on his plate made his mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the ribs filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: She savored every bite of the juicy ribs.
